## ICache.resolve() method

Resolves an instance of a service

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resolve<R>(name: string): R;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | service resolution name |

<b>Returns:</b>

`R`

- an instance of service resolution. Throws [ResolutionError](./typeioc.resolutionerror.md) when no resolution found
